example.mysports.admin
Interface AdminServerConnector

All Known Implementing Classes:
RESTAdminServerConnector
public interface AdminServerConnector

Interface to access the admin server. This abstraction is provided so the runtime can use the default RESTAdminServerConnector while testing outside the container can provide a local version.

Since:
EclipseLink 2.3.0
Author:
dclarke
